Class TetrisBlock

java.lang.Object
TetrisBlock
Direct Known Subclasses:
JBlock, LBlock, RectangleBlock, SquareBlock
public abstract class TetrisBlock
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
Tarini Maram

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    TetrisBlock​(int x, int y)
    Initializes a Tetris Block with a velocity of 1 and the specified coordinate of the top-left corner

  • Constructor Details

    • TetrisBlock

      public TetrisBlock​(int x, int y)
      Initializes a Tetris Block with a velocity of 1 and the specified coordinate of the top-left corner
      Parameters:
      x - X-coordinate of the top-left corner
      y - Y-coordinate of the top-right corner

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw​(processing.core.PApplet marker)
      Draws this Tetris Block
      Parameters:
      marker - PApplet with which to draw this Tetris Block with

    • rotate

      public abstract void rotate()
      Rotates this Tetris Block 90 degrees clockwise

    • setY

      public void setY​(double y)

    • setX

      public void setX​(double x)

    • fall

      public void fall()
      Makes this Tetris Block fall (increasing y-value) according to the velocity

    • move

      public void move​(boolean isRight)
      Moves this Tetris Block 30 pixels horizontally
      Parameters:
      isRight - true if the Tetris Block should move right, false if the Tetris Block is to move left

    • getHorizontalLines

      public java.util.ArrayList<Line> getHorizontalLines()
      Returns:
      All the horizontal Lines from all the Squares in this Tetris Block

    • getVerticalLines

      public java.util.ArrayList<Line> getVerticalLines()
      Returns:
      All the vertical Lines from all the Squares in this Tetris Block

    • isTouchingHorizontal

      public boolean isTouchingHorizontal​(TetrisBlock block)
      Determines if one of the horizontal sides of this Tetris Block is overlapping with one of the horizontal sides of the other specified Tetris Block
      Parameters:
      block - the other Tetris Block to test the overlapping with
      Returns:
      true if this Tetris Block is horizontally touching the other Tetris Block, false if not

    • isTouchingVertical

      public boolean isTouchingVertical​(TetrisBlock block)
      Determines if one of the vertical sides of this Tetris Block is overlapping with one of the vertical sides of the other specified Tetris Block
      Parameters:
      block - the other Tetris Block to test the overlapping with
      Returns:
      true if this Tetris Block is vertically touching the other Tetris Block, false if not

    • isTouchingHorizontal

      public boolean isTouchingHorizontal​(Square square)
      Determines if one of the horizontal sides of this Tetris Block is overlapping with one of the horizontal sides of the specified Square
      Parameters:
      block - the Square to test the overlapping with
      Returns:
      true if this Tetris Block is horizontally touching the Square, false if not

    • isTouchingVertical

      public boolean isTouchingVertical​(Square square)
      Determines if one of the vertical sides of this Tetris Block is overlapping with one of the vertical sides of the specified Square
      Parameters:
      block - the Square to test the overlapping with
      Returns:
      true if this Tetris Block is vertically touching the Square, false if not

    • isTouchingHorizontal

      public boolean isTouchingHorizontal​(Line line)
      Determines if one of the horizontal sides of this Tetris Block is overlapping with the specified Line
      Parameters:
      line - Line to test the overlapping with
      Returns:
      true if this Tetris Block is horizontally touching this Line, false if not
      Precondition:
      Line must be horizontal

    • isTouchingVertical

      public boolean isTouchingVertical​(Line line)
      Determines if one of the vertical sides of this Tetris Block is overlapping with the specified Line
      Parameters:
      line - Line to test the overlapping with
      Returns:
      true if this Tetris Block is vertically touching this Line, false if not
      Precondition:
      Line must be vertical

    • isPartiallyOverlapping

      public boolean isPartiallyOverlapping​(Square block)
      Determines Determines if this Tetris Block is partially overlapping vertically with Square, i.e. part of their vertical sides are touching but not necessarily completely
      Parameters:
      block - Square to test overlapping with
      Returns:
      true if this Tetris Block is partially vertically overlapping with the Square, false if not

    • stopFall

      public void stopFall()
      Stops this tetris block from falling (moving down vertically) Sets velocity to 0

      public double getX()
      Returns:
      X-coordinate of the top-left corner of this Tetris Block

      public double getY()
      Returns:
      Y-coordinate of the top-left corner of this Tetris Block

      public void setSquares​(java.util.ArrayList<Square> squares)
      Sets the Squares that are used to construct this Tetris Block
      Parameters:
      squares - Squares that make up this Tetris Block

      public java.util.ArrayList<Square> getSquares()
